title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
**Product Name:** Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black

**Product Details:**

This sleek and compact Keurig coffee maker is the perfect addition to any kitchen, office, or dorm room. With its single-serve K-Cup pod design, you can brew a fresh cup of coffee in under a minute. Choose from three brew sizes - 6, 8, or 10 ounces - to suit your preference.

The Keurig K-Compact comes with a 36-ounce removable water reservoir, ensuring you can brew several cups before needing a refill. Its smart start feature allows the machine to heat up and brew in one simple process, while the button controls make operation easy and intuitive.

In terms of energy efficiency, this coffee maker features an auto-off function that turns the machine off after two hours of inactivity, helping you save on electricity bills. The removable drip tray can accommodate travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew, making clean-up a breeze.

One of the standout features of the Keurig K-Compact is its hot water dispense option, which allows you to enjoy a cup of tea, hot cocoa, or instant soup. The compact design of this coffee maker, with a width of just 8 inches, ensures it doesn't take up too much counter space.

This coffee maker is compatible with a wide variety of K-Cup pods, giving you endless flavor options. However, it's important to note that it is not compatible with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter.

This product may arrive in packaging that varies from the image shown, but the high-quality coffee maker remains the same. Upgrade your coffee experience with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker today!
